attributes.action: exempt organ transplant recepients from prescription charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently those who recieve a kidney (and other )transplants have to pay full prescription charges - whilst i understand that we could buy prepayment certifcates it seems grossly unfair that Diabetics are fully exempt - we would die if we stopped taking immune suppresants and the other support drugs - I currently take up to 13 tablets a day- can we please bring some fairness into the system
